title: OPEN HOUSE SUNDAY 8.7.22.Newly Remodeled NO FEE  Near Tufts $2,750/mo.
posting_body: Newly renovated kitchen, bathroom and beautiful hard wood floors, 2 bedroom apartment unit in condominium building, with off-street parking, laundry facilities in the building.
Brand new appliances: oven, refrigerator, dishwasher, disposal.
Located on Main Street in Medford, convenient within walking distance to Tufts and close access to routes 93 and 2.
Public transportation is close and there are plenty of amenities including stores and restaurants within walking distance.
Please email to arrange a showing.
297 Main St is an apartment located in Middlesex County and the 02155 ZIP Code.
